about.title: About Me
about.1p1s: Currently undergoing a career change into the field of computer science, I am now able to offer my services as a beginner Full Stack Web Developer.
about.1p2s: Dynamic, self-taught, and passionate, I am able to work both independently and as part of a team.
about.1p3s: I also enjoy analyzing and solving complex problems.
about.2p1s: If you are looking for a motivated and hardworking developer, I would love to discuss with you!
